alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson; Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 11:22PM CDT until August 26 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jefferson County in southeastern Nebraska... Southeastern Saline County in southeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Gage County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1122 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jansen, or 8 miles northeast of Fairbury, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Beatrice, De Witt, Plymouth, Diller, Jansen, Swanton, Harbine, Holmesville, Ellis, Swan Creek Wildlife Management Area, Cub Creek Recreational Area, and Homestead National Historical Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
